privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Kiniro List, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our anime tracking service.
privacy.informationWeCollectContent:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as:

• Account information (email address, display name, profile picture) when you sign in with Google
• Anime library data (watching status, progress, ratings)
• Preferences and settings you configure in the app
• Usage data and interaction with our services
privacy.howWeUseInformationContent:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Personalize your experience and anime recommendations
• Sync your anime library across devices
• Send you notifications about your tracked anime (if enabled)
• Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform
• Communicate with you about updates and features
privacy.dataStorageContent: Your data is stored securely using Firebase services provided by Google. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesContent:
We use the following third-party services:

• Google Firebase for authentication and data storage
• AniList API for anime information and metadata
• Vercel for hosting and analytics

These services have their own privacy policies governing the use of your information.
privacy.cookiesContent:
We use cookies and local storage to:

• Keep you signed in to your account
• Remember your preferences (theme, language)
• Analyze site traffic and usage

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.yourRightsContent:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Delete your account and associated data
• Export your library data
• Opt-out of non-essential communications

To exercise these rights, please contact us at admin@kinirolist.app
privacy.childrenPrivacyContent: Kiniro List is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.
privacy.changesContent: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contactContent:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: admin@kinirolist.app

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Kiniro List. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.
terms.acceptanceOfTermsContent: By creating an account or using Kiniro List, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.descriptionOfServiceContent:
Kiniro List is a free anime tracking platform that allows users to:

• Track anime they are watching, have completed, or plan to watch
• View airing schedules and seasonal anime calendars
• Discover new anime through recommendations
• Sync their library across devices
terms.userAccountsContent:
To use certain features of Kiniro List, you must create an account using Google Sign-In. You are responsible for:

• Maintaining the security of your account
• All activities that occur under your account
• Ensuring your account information is accurate and up-to-date
terms.acceptableUseContent:
You agree not to:

• Use the service for any illegal purpose
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
• Interfere with or disrupt the service
• Upload malicious code or content
• Scrape or collect data without permission
• Impersonate others or misrepresent your affiliation
• Violate the rights of others
terms.intellectualPropertyContent: The Kiniro List name, logo, and original content are owned by us. Anime information, images, and metadata are provided by AniList and belong to their respective owners. You retain ownership of your personal library data.
terms.thirdPartyContentContent: Kiniro List displays anime information from AniList and may link to third-party streaming services. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, or availability of these external services.
terms.disclaimersContent:
Kiniro List is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that:

• The service will be uninterrupted or error-free
• All anime information will be accurate or complete
• The service will meet your specific requirements
terms.limitationOfLiabilityContent: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Kiniro List shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service.
terms.terminationContent: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion. You may delete your account at any time through the settings page.
terms.changesContent: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.contactContent:
For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

Email: admin@kinirolist.app

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions

feedback.formDescription: We read every message and appreciate your input!
feedback.typeLabel: What type of feedback is this?
feedback.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what's on your mind... What could we improve? Did you find a bug? Have a feature idea?

feedback.thankYouDescription: Your feedback has been received. We appreciate you taking the time to help us improve.
